about.summary: Hello! My name is Leo Lee, and I'm a Computer Science and Applied Statistics student at UVA with experience in full-stack development, machine learning, and software engineering. Currently working as a CS Teaching Assistant and undergraduate researcher with Dr. Yanjun Qi, working on agentic AI. If I'm not behind my computer, you can find me playing golf, working out, or trying new food!

projects.title: PGAssistant
projects.summary: ML pipeline predicting PGA Tour scores with 0.44 RMSE accuracy.
projects.details:
• Built XGBoost model predicting player scoring averages with 0.44 RMSE and 70% variance explanation
• Created Selenium web scraper to collect 1400+ player stats from PGA Tour website
• Used feature ranking and cross-validation to identify top 9 predictive stats, reducing error by 15%
• Applied SHAP analysis to find 'Greens in Regulation' and 'Birdie Percentage' as key predictors
